text: Salmon Arm is a city in the Canadian province of British Columbia. Salmon Arm is found in the Shuswap Country of the Southern Interior. The population of Salmon Arm was 19,432 in 2021. The mayor of Salmon Arm is Alan Harrison. Salmon Arm has an ice hockey team in the British Columbia Hockey League (BCHL) called the Salmon Arm Silverbacks. ==References== ==Other websites== *Town of Salmon Arm's Official website Category:Cities in British Columbia
title: Salmon Arm
